chapters.title: Chapter 14: Wet Things
chapters.info: Zarya Alkaese, p. 328—Real name of Garenia, the name she used as a novice before Vandene and Adeleas left on their retreat to Tifan's Well. She has a strong nose and a wide mouth. She is actually over ninety, but she looks like she is not yet into middle age. She has since been forced back into novice white and is learning from Vandene. She grew up in Saldaea.
